players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

You: "Bob was killed on Night 1, so we know one of the remaining three of us is the mafioso. We need to be very careful with our vote today since with only 4 players total, one wrong vote could end the game."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why would you investigate me first instead of someone more suspicious? That seems like a risky move for a real detective."
You: "Charlie, can you explain your reasoning for investigating Diana specifically on Night 1? And Diana, what's your take on Charlie's claim - do you think he's lying about being the detective?"
Charlie: "I investigated Diana because with only 4 players, any choice had a 1/3 chance of finding mafia. I got lucky. Diana is deflecting instead of denying the claim."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're truly the detective, why didn't you investigate Alice first? A real detective would prioritize confirming a town member, not gambling on finding mafia with our first vote."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
